QuestData.Title: Dark Arts
QuestData.Description: It is said that Shan'ze Dao was once home to a great mogu temple.$B$BThere, the Shan'ze studied and practiced the art of subjugating the dead or inanimate.$B$BMuch of their knowledge still remains on the island to the northwest, buried among the ruins.$B$BWe need to get our hands on their knowledge - both to keep it out of their hands, and to understand the nature of their experiments.
